entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.6°C

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 76 %

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 early in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
